actually, I don\'t really like sweets

string-array.name: skyQ
string-array.item: Imagine a clear blue sky without a single cloud. Just thinking about it should improve your mood at least a little. Now take a look at the surrounding landscape with the eyes of consciousness. Which of the following pictures looks most soothing and relaxing to you?

string-array.name: victimQ
string-array.item: Do you think you have a bad temper and cannot be tolerated?
Do you think you have to do something imposed by your social role (for example, cleaning or cooking), otherwise you will not live up to it?
Are you comparing your achievements with others to your disadvantage?
Do you think that you are constantly unlucky, while others, on the contrary, are lucky?
Are you doing more for the people around you than for yourself?
Is it difficult for you to refuse another person what you do not want to do, but he insists?
Are you sure that without the help of other people you would not achieve anything in life at all?
Do you tend to underestimate your skills and abilities? And do you find it difficult to evaluate the result of your own work (you may feel that you are always underestimated)?
Do you feel that you do not have enough opportunities to achieve your goals (talent, connections, funds, etc.)?
Are you sure that you cannot love a person just like that, but only for his achievements?
